en.title: FE Donates 100,000 Baht to Anonymous Warriors Association 333 Thailand
en.content: During FE's recent Thailand Achievers Recognition Dinner on 04th April 2009, FE, represented by Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee, Donated 100,000 Baht to the Anonymous Warriors Association 333 of Thailand, represented by Air Chief Marshal Kant Phimarnthip, General Prasert Phakcharoen, Major General Charoen Techawanich and Directors of the Association. The mock cheque presentation was witnessed by Police General Professor Darun Sotthiphan.

meta.description: FusionExcel donates 100,000 Baht to Anonymous Warriors Association 333 Thailand during Thailand Achievers Recognition Dinner on 04th April 2009.
